name: combo

combo noun
(MUSICIANS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] a small group of musicians who play dance and jazz music

combo noun
(MIXTURE)
[ C ] a combination of different things: That's a funny combo - pink and orange. I'll have the burrito and taco combo, please.
